name: Strand of Hair
description: This could belong to anyone. Gross. Might make a good gift for those who groom...TOO much.

name: Dandelion Seed
description: This fluffy seed floats away when you blow on it. Makes adults feel like kids. Effect on kids unknown.

name: Spiderweb
description: Enemy of housekeepers who don't own ladders. BFF of Halloween enthusiasts. Good work, spiders.

name: Apple Core
description: Something happened here. Something...delicious. Oh well. Into the compost it goes.
